title: PRUSSIAN HEART
description: Short StoryMya Bennett is a successful and attractive woman struggling with balancing a difficult past and a recent break up.Suddenly, while searching for a gift in an unusual antiques store, she is drawn into an incredible story from half a world away. One of ancient curses, war...and love...Will she discover the secret of the RÃ¤uchermann?Part of the Sam Asher's 'Free to Love' Series.Paranormal Romance / Supernatural Love Short Stories.Note: Sam here, I check in regularly so if you have any thoughts on this or any of my books give me a shout and let me know. I welcome feedback! Thanks
author: Sam Asher
